description: Have dinner ready in a flash with this quick and easy garlic prawns and couscous salad recipe.
name: Garlic Prawns With Couscous Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g green beans, trimmed, cut into thirds diagonally

recipeInstructions.text: Combine prawns and half each of the oil and lemon juice in a bowl, then set aside.
Place couscous and paprika in a large heatproof bowl. Add 1 cup boiling water, then cover and stand for 5 minutes. Stir with a fork to separate couscous, then season.
Place beans in a separate heatproof bowl and cover with boiling water. Stand, covered, for 5 minutes or until tender. Drain and refresh under cold water. Add beans and tomato to couscous bowl.

Heat half the remaining oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 7 minutes or until light golden. Add onion, parsley and remaining lemon juice to couscous. Season and stir to combine.

Heat remaining oil in same pan over high heat. Drain prawns and cook, turning occasionally, for 3 minutes or until prawns change colour and are cooked through. Serve couscous salad topped with prawns.
